mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Refresh_Token (user_email, access_token, refresh_token, refresh_token_expiration_at) VALUES (#{userEmail}, #{accessToken}, #{refreshToken}, #{refreshTokenExpirationAt}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE idx = ( SELECT idx FROM ( SELECT (idx + 1) AS idx FROM Refresh_Token B ORDER BY idx DESC LIMIT 1) AS A), access_token = #{accessToken}, refresh_token = #{refreshToken}, refresh_token_expiration_at = #{refreshTokenExpirationAt}, user_email = #{userEmail}
